mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Babbott, Lewis
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Flat Rock, Seneca Co., Ohio [Flat Rock, Seneca County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Babbott, Lewis Patient Age: 17. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of inferior maxillary bone on right side. Bullet - entering the outer of upper lip and passing downwards or backwards wounding image (end) molar teeth above and below and lodged between the integuments and masseter muscle at the angle of jaw bone. Extracted on the field. Surgeon unknown. . Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Treatment: Furlough [1865]/10/15. Result: Transferred to US Genl Hospital Columbus Ohio.
